Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key for the tag. May not be null.

type.description: The key for the tag. May not be null.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The tag's value. May be null.

type.description: The tag's value. May be null.

resource.description: The AWS::MemoryDB::ParameterGroup resource creates an Amazon MemoryDB ParameterGroup.

properties.name: ParameterGroupName
properties.description: The name of the parameter group.

type.description: The name of the parameter group.

properties.name: Family
properties.description: The name of the parameter group family that this parameter group is compatible with.

type.description: The name of the parameter group family that this parameter group is compatible with.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A description of the parameter group.

type.description: A description of the parameter group.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this parameter group.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this parameter group.

properties.name: Parameters
properties.description: An map of parameter names and values for the parameter update. You must supply at least one parameter name and value; subsequent arguments are optional.

type.description: An map of parameter names and values for the parameter update. You must supply at least one parameter name and value; subsequent arguments are optional.

attributes.description: The AWS::MemoryDB::ParameterGroup resource creates an Amazon MemoryDB ParameterGroup.

properties.name: ARN
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the parameter group.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the parameter group.
